title-group.article-title: Adapting Expert System Technology to Financial Management

abstract.p: Perhaps the greatest obstacle to the successful use of financial expert systems is a lack of clear understanding about the nature of expert systems, the means for developing them, and their potential benefits. These issues are addressed here by providing an overview of expert system architecture illustrated with financial examples, a survey of current financial expert systems, the outlines of financial expert systems for supporting strategic decisions, and the identification of research directions needed to more fully exploit expert system technology for financial applications.
